title: Was Jimi Hendrix Kicked Off a Monkees Tour?
subtitle: Was Jimi Hendrix kicked off a Monkees tour because the Daughters of the American Revolution complained his act was 'too erotic'?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Jimi Hendrix was dropped as an opening act from a Monkees tour because the Daughters of the American Revolution complained that his stage act was "too erotic."
